Peseus had completed searching the room.  They found that it was
almost a p=
erfect square metal room, with some sort of a metal door at
one end which w=
as almost as wide as that whole side of the room.  He
was just about to cal=
l another "meeting" when a signal came over the
radio.

"Well, at least I k=
now my radio still works." he said to himself as he
tried to get to where t=
he signal was strongest, "Hello, is somebody
there?"

The others seemed to =
notice that he was talking to himself, but remained quiet.

r.  They dont' say a word.

by at least 3 pairs of lights.

kness.

is going on."

e trying to
